TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XDocumentType extends System.Xml.Linq.XNode

summary.span: 表示 XML 文档类型定义 (DTD)。

span.span: Represents an XML Document Type Definition (DTD).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 XML 中的数据类型定义 (DTD) 是一种以执行以下操作：Data Type Definitions (DTD) in XML are a way to do the following: - 验证在有限范围内的 XML 树。Validate XML trees to a limited extent. - 展开实体，这是一种形式的文本替换。Expand entities, which is a form of text replacement. - 提供默认属性。Supply default attributes. 此类表示 DTD 的 XML 概念。This class represents the XML concept of a DTD. DTD 支持中[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]限制。DTD support in [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] is limited. [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] 默认情况下，通过将扩展内部的实体，但它不能解析外部实体引用，除非带有关联用于加载 XML 树。 will expand internal entities by default, but it will not resolve external entity references unless an with an associated is used to load the XML tree. [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] 将不会验证对 DTD，一个文档，但你可以使用验证执行 DTD 验证，如有必要。 will not validate a document against a DTD, but you can use a validating to perform DTD validation if necessary. 若要验证[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]针对 XML 架构，使用树方法。To validate an [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] tree against an XML schema, use the method. 当文档中包含在 DTD 中定义的实体引用时，这些引用将在创建 XML 树时展开。When a document contains entity references that are defined in a DTD, the references are expanded upon creation of the XML tree. 但是，当序列化或保存的 XML 树时，被保留的扩展的实体的内容;不是实体引用。However, when you serialize or save the XML tree, the content of the expanded entities is preserved; the entity references are not. DTD 中的默认属性将具体化为 XML 树中的常规属性。Default attributes from the DTD will be materialized as regular attributes in the XML tree. 具体化 DTD 的默认属性后，没有方法来确定该属性从 DTD 的默认属性。After a default attribute from the DTD is materialized, there is no way to determine that the attribute was a default attribute from the DTD. 你可以填充 XML 树与 XML 文档包含内部 DTD。You can populate an XML tree with an XML document that contains an internal DTD. XML 树将包含节点。The XML tree will then contain a node. 当序列化或保存树时，内部 DTD 将还将保存为文档的一部分。When you serialize or save the tree, the internal DTD will also be saved as part of the document.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: An object to copy from.

summary.span: 从其他 对象初始化 类的实例。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class from another object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建 XML 树的深层副本时，主要是内部使用此构造函数。This constructor is primarily used internally when making a deep copy of an XML tree.

MemberSignature.Value: public XDocumentType (string name, string publicId, string systemId, string internalSubset);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, string publicId, string systemId, string internalSubset) cil managed
Public Sub New (name As String, publicId As String, systemId As String, internalSubset As String)
public: XDocumentType(System::String ^ name, System::String ^ publicId, System::String ^ systemId, System::String ^ internalSubset);

param.name: name
param.span: 一个包含 DTD 的限定名的 ，此名称与 XML 文档的根元素的限定名相同。

span.span: A that contains the qualified name of the DTD, which is the same as the qualified name of the root element of the XML document.

param.name: publicId
param.span: 一个 ，其中包含外部公共 DTD 的公共标识符。

span.span: A that contains the public identifier of an external public DTD.

param.name: systemId
param.span: 一个 ，其中包含外部专用 DTD 的系统标识符。

span.span: A that contains the system identifier of an external private DTD.

param.name: internalSubset
param.span: 一个 ，其中包含内部 DTD 的内部子集。

span.span: A that contains the internal subset for an internal DTD.
Initializes an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建具有内部 DTD 的文档。The following example creates a document with an internal DTD. 在创建时对象，它指定 DTD (Pubs) 和一个字符串，包含内部子集的限定的名称。When it creates the object, it specifies the qualified name of the DTD (Pubs), and a string that contains the internal subset. 因为文档不使用公共或私有外部 DTD、`publicId`和`systemId`设置为`null`。Because the document does not use a public or private external DTD, the `publicId` and `systemId` are set to `null`. ```csharp string internalSubset = @" "; string target = "xml-stylesheet"; string data = "href=\"mystyle.css\" title=\"Compact\" type=\"text/css\""; XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment."), new XProcessingInstruction(target, data), new XDocumentType("Pubs", null, null, internalSubset), new XElement("Pubs", new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Artifacts of Roman Civilization"), new XElement("Author", "Moreno, Jordao") ), new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Midieval Tools and Implements"), new XElement("Author", "Gazit, Inbar") ) ), new XComment("This is another comment.") ); doc.Declaration = new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "true"); Console.WriteLine(doc); ``` ```vb Dim internalSubset = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" Dim doc As XDocument = _ Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar doc.FirstNode.NextNode.AddAfterSelf(new XDocumentType("Pubs", Nothing, Nothing, internalSubset)) Console.WriteLine(doc) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml ]> Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ InternalSubset { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置此文档类型定义 (DTD) 的内部子集。

span.span: Gets or sets the internal subset for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

value.span: 一个 ，其中包含此文档类型定义的 (DTD) 的内部子集。

span.span: A that contains the internal subset for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建使用包含内部子集 DTD 的文档。The following example creates a document with a DTD that contains an internal subset. ```csharp string internalSubset = @" "; string target = "xml-stylesheet"; string data = "href=\"mystyle.css\" title=\"Compact\" type=\"text/css\""; XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment."), new XProcessingInstruction(target, data), new XDocumentType("Pubs", null, null, internalSubset), new XElement("Pubs", new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Artifacts of Roman Civilization"), new XElement("Author", "Moreno, Jordao") ), new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Midieval Tools and Implements"), new XElement("Author", "Gazit, Inbar") ) ), new XComment("This is another comment.") ); doc.Declaration = new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "true"); Console.WriteLine(doc.DocumentType.InternalSubset); ``` ```vb Dim internalSubset = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" Dim doc As XDocument = _ Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar doc.FirstNode.AddAfterSelf(new XDocumentType("Pubs", Nothing, Nothing, internalSubset)) Console.WriteLine(doc.DocumentType.InternalSubset) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置此文档类型定义 (DTD) 的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

value.span: 一个 ，其中包含此文档类型定义的 (DTD) 的名称。

span.span: A that contains the name for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建包含 DTD 的 XML 文档。The following example creates an XML document that contains a DTD. 在创建后的文档，它将检索 DTD 使用此属性的限定的名称。After creating the document, it retrieves the qualified name of the DTD using this property. ```csharp string internalSubset = @" "; string target = "xml-stylesheet"; string data = "href=\"mystyle.css\" title=\"Compact\" type=\"text/css\""; XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment."), new XProcessingInstruction(target, data), new XDocumentType("Pubs", null, null, internalSubset), new XElement("Pubs", new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Artifacts of Roman Civilization"), new XElement("Author", "Moreno, Jordao") ), new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Midieval Tools and Implements"), new XElement("Author", "Gazit, Inbar") ) ), new XComment("This is another comment.") ); doc.Declaration = new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "true"); Console.WriteLine(doc.DocumentType.Name); ``` ```vb Dim internalSubset = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" Dim doc As XDocument = _ Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar doc.FirstNode.AddAfterSelf(new XDocumentType("Pubs", Nothing, Nothing, internalSubset)) Console.WriteLine(doc.DocumentType.Name) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Pubs ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property NodeType As XmlNodeType
public: virtual property System::Xml::XmlNodeType NodeType { System::Xml::XmlNodeType get(); };

summary.span: 获取此节点的节点类型。

span.span: Gets the node type for this node.
The node type.
For objects, this value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为派生自的所有类包含属性，你可以编写代码进行操作的具体子类的集合。Because all classes that derive from contain a property, you can write code that operates on collections of concrete subclass of . 集合中每个节点的节点类型随后可以测试你的代码。Your code can then test for the node type of each node in the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性来检索的节点类型对象。The following example shows the use of this property to retrieve the node type for an object. ```csharp string internalSubset = @" "; string target = "xml-stylesheet"; string data = "href=\"mystyle.css\" title=\"Compact\" type=\"text/css\""; XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment."), new XProcessingInstruction(target, data), new XDocumentType("Pubs", null, null, internalSubset), new XElement("Pubs", new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Artifacts of Roman Civilization"), new XElement("Author", "Moreno, Jordao") ), new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Midieval Tools and Implements"), new XElement("Author", "Gazit, Inbar") ) ), new XComment("This is another comment.") ); doc.Declaration = new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "true"); Console.WriteLine(doc.DocumentType.NodeType); ``` ```vb Dim internalSubset = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" Dim doc As XDocument = _ Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar doc.FirstNode.AddAfterSelf(new XDocumentType("Pubs", Nothing, Nothing, internalSubset)) Console.WriteLine(doc.DocumentType.NodeType.ToString()) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` DocumentType ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PublicId { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置此文档类型定义 (DTD) 的公共标识符。

span.span: Gets or sets the public identifier for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

value.span: 一个 ，其中包含此文档类型定义 (DTD) 的公共标识符。

span.span: A that contains the public identifier for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 XML 文档使用外部的公共 DTD，此属性将包含外部 DTD 的公共标识符。If an XML document uses an external public DTD, this property will contain the public identifier of the external DTD.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SystemId { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置此文档类型定义 (DTD) 的系统标识符。

span.span: Gets or sets the system identifier for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

value.span: 一个 ，其中包含此文档类型定义 (DTD) 的系统标识符。

span.span: A that contains the system identifier for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 XML 文档使用外部私有 DTD，此属性将包含外部 DTD 的专用标识符。If an XML document uses an external private DTD, this property will contain the private identifier of the external DTD. ## Examples 下面的示例创建引用外部私有 DTD 的 XML 文档。The following example creates an XML document that refers to an external private DTD. DTD 不具有内部子集中。The DTD does not have an internal subset. 调用构造函数反映外部的私有 DTD 的使用。The call to the constructor reflects the use of the external private DTD. 它将传递`null`内部子集。It passes `null` for the internal subset. ```csharp string pubsDtd = @" "; File.WriteAllText("Pubs.dtd", pubsDtd); string target = "xml-stylesheet"; string data = "href=\"mystyle.css\" title=\"Compact\" type=\"text/css\""; XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XDocumentType("Pubs", null, "Pubs.dtd", null), new XElement("Pubs", new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Artifacts of Roman Civilization"), new XElement("Author", "Moreno, Jordao") ), new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Midieval Tools and Implements"), new XElement("Author", "Gazit, Inbar") ) ), new XComment("This is another comment.") ); doc.Declaration = new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "true"); doc.Save("Pubs.xml"); // Validate Pubs.xml against Pubs.dtd. XmlReaderSettings xrs = new XmlReaderSettings(); xrs.ProhibitDtd = false; xrs.ValidationType = ValidationType.DTD; xrs.ConformanceLevel = ConformanceLevel.Auto; XmlReader xr = XmlReader.Create("Pubs.xml", xrs); XDocument doc2 = XDocument.Load(xr); XDocumentType dt = doc2.Document.DocumentType; Console.WriteLine("SystemId:{0}", dt.SystemId); ``` ```vb Dim pubsDtd As String = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" File.WriteAllText("Pubs.dtd", pubsDtd) Dim target As String = "xml-stylesheet" Dim data As String = "href='mystyle.css' title='Compact' type='text/css'" Dim doc As XDocument = _ Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar doc _ .FirstNode _ .AddBeforeSelf(New XDocumentType("Pubs", Nothing, "Pubs.dtd", Nothing)) doc.Declaration = New XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "true") doc.Save("Pubs.xml") ' Validate Pubs.xml against Pubs.dtd. Dim xrs As XmlReaderSettings = New XmlReaderSettings() xrs.ProhibitDtd = False xrs.ValidationType = ValidationType.DTD xrs.ConformanceLevel = ConformanceLevel.Auto Dim xr As XmlReader = XmlReader.Create("Pubs.xml", xrs) Dim doc2 As XDocument = XDocument.Load(xr) Dim dt As XDocumentType = doc2.Document.DocumentType Console.WriteLine("SystemId:{0}", dt.SystemId) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` SystemId:Pubs.dtd ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteTo(class System.Xml.XmlWriter writer) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub WriteTo (writer As XmlWriter)

span.span: An into which this method will write.
Write this to an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要用于在内部写入到 XML 树的方法通过。This method is primarily used internally by the methods that write an XML tree to an .

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Threading.Tasks.Task WriteToAsync (System.Xml.XmlWriter writer, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task WriteToAsync(class System.Xml.XmlWriter writer, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
public: override System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ WriteToAsync(System::Xml::XmlWriter ^ writer, System::Threading::CancellationToken cancellationToken);
